name: Motocross Rivals - Stunt Riders
description:
*** THE ULTIMATE IN DIRT BIKE RALLY RACING! ***

Experience the dirt and the dust on the back of two wheels with turbo power at your fingertips!

Game Features:
- Varied game modes, solo and VS game play!
- Challenging 3D courses to ride over!
- Rocking sound track!

DOWNLOAD AND RIDE TODAY!
